family.name: discounts
family.description:
The Discounts resource provides the discount amount for a [cart][carts] or the discount amount for a [purchase][purchases].
[carts]: #carts

relationship.name: discount-to-cart
relationship.description:
Retrieve the discount amount applied to a cart [total][totals], excluding line item discounts.
[totals]: #totals

resource.name: discount-for-cart
resource.description: A discount resource that identifies discount amount applied to a cart, excluding line item discounts.

relationship.name: discount-to-purchase
relationship.description:
Retrieve the discount amount applied to a [purchase][purchases].
[purchases]: #purchases

resource.name: discount-for-purchase
resource.description: A discount resource that identifies discount amount applied to a purchase.

property.name: discount
property.description: The amount of the discount. Similar to prices, discount is an array because the total may be a combination of amounts in multiple currencies, for example $20 CAD + 20000 points.
